about_the_game:
You will have a different initial deck depending on the character you choose to play! Each time you win a battle, you will be rewarded with a choice of a card between three.

Also, you can buy some cards in Jenny's Shop and try to build a deck with a lot of synergies between cards!

Sometimes, when criminals are caught, they will leave behind a gadget. They can also give it to you directly on an event or you can even buy it from Jenny for a sum of rootcoins. Try to obtain the most incredible synergy!

Boost replayability with two different characters, each featuring completely unique mechanics and playstyles. Explore their distinct strategies for a fresh challenge every run!

Immerse yourself in a combat system based on card speed. Master the action times of each enemy to establish a winning strategy!

Learn how to use the different types of cards and control their activation speed, thus dealing strong blows or applying curious altered states to your enemies.

Interact with the different random events scattered throughout the city's neighborhoods, where you can learn more about the characters. But be careful, depending on the decisions you make, you could even end up harmed!

  • Create different types of decks! More than 100 cards that will allow you to build them according to your play style.

  • Card usage and enemy actions are determined by speed! Master this dynamic speed system to put your strategic timing skills to the test.

  • Interrogate all the citizens! Up to 30 unique characters that roam the streets of Tubercle City.

  • Unlock new zones! The city is formed by 3 playable zones, each one with its own culture, society and rules.

  • Equip several gadgets! Throughout the city you will discover powerful items that improve your deck and may create interesting synergies...

  • Investigate every neighborhood! Like the great detective that you are, you must discover every last citizen and card there is.

short_description: Fight your way through this deck-building roguelike with real-time mechanics and save the city from the Vegangsters! Fight against the worst criminals in a series of turn-based battles determined by the speed of your cards.
